item.title: Firebase Analytics for the Web
item.description: Firebase recently announced support for Analytics and Remote Config on the web. When combined, these services make it possible to customize the UI/UX of your app based on data collected from Google Analytics. The following lesson will show you how to collect Google Analytics events and user properties, then read aggregated data in your app to customize the experience for a specific audience. Initial Setup Firebase Analytics was added to the JavaScript SDK in version 7.
